attributes.description:
Perfect For Urban Adventures. With Multi-Sense Drive Modes & 3D Sound, Plus Much More! The New Renault Kiger Is The Latest Addition To The Renault SUV Family. Kiger Price. 8" Touchscreen. Turbo. ISOFIX. ABS + EBD. Arkamys 3D Sound. SUV Design. 4X Airbags.
The Renault KIGER’s high cabin storage volume has you ready for the new, when you hit the road with your group. Get space for all your belongings with the 405L cargo space that can be enhanced to 879L by folding rear seats. There’s a total cabin storage volume of 29L including storage space of 14.9L in upper and lower glove boxes and 7.5L in the high centre console storage compartment. The KIGER’s rear row comes with a knee room of 222 mm, a flat floor and elbow width of 1431 mm to help comfortably seat three.

attributes.description:
One of the most original 35-year-old cars with just a few minor touch-ups, Original from Taillights to Headlights Cleanest in South Africa and probably in the World, A true Iconic Piece of Toyota's History 
The Interior has never been changed, the Original Radio from 1986 as well as the very first Toyota floor mats from the day of Delivery
Original Alloy Rims, With only 102 000 Kms For a 35-year-old car, the 2.4 GLE motor and automatic Transmission will last you another 50 years if kept and appreciated in this condition
It's one in a million that’s in this condition and very rare to come across 

You will only know the true beauty of this vehicle once you walked into our showroom to admire this absolute stunner

OPEN TO COLLECTORS OFFERS

Proud 2018 Top 10 Dealer of the Year Winner
* Renowned for exceptional sales and premium customer care
* Exclusive Selection of prime stock at preferred pricing
* Quality vehicles that pass the strict Certified Pre-Owned check & AA DEKRA
